name: T-SOULZ
description:
It's pretty similar to Tetris, but I made the following changes for it to be out of control:

  • The pieces don't go down by itselves.
  • There are pieces of length 4 and 5.
  • The game won't show you which piece comes next.
  • The rows only get erased when you pass a level.
  • There is a time countdown for you to complete each level.

(At the beginning, I thought about hiding the pieces that you added in the current level; but, imo, that probably would be too much out of control for it to be fun 😅). I  made this game alone for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 (my third followed year participating 💪) and have to say that I never made a Tetris before, so it was an interesting experience 👍

I'm looking forward to know your opinions and how far can you go 👀

By the way, you can check my youtube channel here (there I upload my music and little more): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3SVl7OFdGcDlmMZbRDHhMQ/featured
